data.name: Nusakana OST
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the relaxing, beautiful music of Nusakana; where Jazz meets Bossa Nova. As you explore a far away southern tropical setting, start with an exciting track welcoming you to the island, relive your journey through ups and downs, and close with an epic farewell track. All composed by Jasmine Cooper.

Features:
  • Includes 46 audio tracks in mp3 and high quality lossless (FLAC) format.
  • An Unlocked music room, containing commentary and inspiration for each track by the composer, is in the main menu.

Track List:
01. Nyanyian Pulau
02. Welcome to Nusakana!
03. A letter, A train, A change
04. Tropical Breeze ~ Morning
05. Tropical Breeze ~ Midday
06. Tropical Breeze ~ Afternoon
07. Tropical Breeze ~ Night
08. Gadis Yang Ceria
09. Serang!
10.We Won!
11.Cinta Seorang Ibu
12. Walk With Me
13. Walk With Me ~ Night
14. Gadis Yang Lihai
15. Terlahir Dari Lautan
16. Terlahir Dari Lautan ~ Night
17. Friendly Faces
18. Gadis Yang Penyayang
19. Pull And Conquer
20. Seafoam and A Wink
21. Joyful Incline
22. Joyful Incline ~ Night
23. Hamparan Cendawan
24. Hamparan Cendawan ~ Night
25. Gadis Yang Menyendiri
26. What Are You Up To, Now?
27. Menjatuhkan Raksasa
28. Nuansa Hijau
29. Nuansa Hijau ~ Night
30. Hollowed Whispers
31. What Was That?!
32. They Say...
33. A Normal Day
34. Quite Alright
35. When I'm With You
36. Losing Touch
37. Misteri Nusakana
38. Tidak Diundang ~ Part 1
39. Tidak Diundang ~ Part 2
40. Pilihan Sulit
41. Selamatkan Ratu
42. Selamat Tinggal, Nusakana ~ 1
43. Selamat Tinggal, Nusakana ~ 2
44. Selamat Tinggal, Nusakana ~ 3
45. Selamat Tinggal, Nusakana ~ 4
46. Where We Are Now

data.short_description: Enjoy the relaxing, beautiful music of Nusakana where Jazz meets Bossa Nova in the far away southern tropical settings composed by Jasmine Cooper. Starting with an exciting track welcoming you to the island throughout your journeys with ups and downs, closed with an epic farewell track.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1700 MB available space
